titleStmt.title: The kingdom of God among men a tract of the sound state of religion, or that Christianity which is described in the holy Scriptures and of the things that make for the security and increase thereof in the world, designing its more ample diffusion among the professed Christians of all sorts and its surer propagation to future ages : with The point of church-unity and schism discuss'd / by John Corbet.
titleStmt.author: Corbet, John, 1620-1680.

notesStmt.note: Note written in manuscript on the verso of t.p., colophon, and preliminaries to The point of church-unity and schism discuss'd.
"The point of church-unity and schism discuss'd," has special t.p. and separate paging.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
